title: A font shown on Yandex
content:
Hello everyone,

I have a simple yet annoying problem. I've seen this font on Yandex, and I can't nor can WhatTheFont identify it for me.

Can anyone help?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317095305im_/http:/typophile.com/files/23feb2015-logo-ru_5187.jpg)

Font: 

 Paratype Textbook 

Solved By: 

 [riccard0](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317095305/http:/typophile.com/user/46071 "View user profile.")
author: marxo

comments.content: It is, tested with the same sample! Thank you.
